name: Randoville
description:
Randoville is a medieval city-builder but with nuance.
Your every move will be controlled by D20 Cube!

  • Appearance of buildings
  • Quality of resource points
  • Number of extracted resources
  • Results of events
Will be decided by throwing a D20!
But don't be frustrated, it is possible to improve your luck!



Choose what to build, roll the Dice and get the result!
The better the number, the easier it will be for you.
Build, earn, level up and open new.
Once you are stuck, give up on everything and REGRESS!
There is no limit to perfection, so you can start again as many times as you want, and small and tireless cuboys will help you to reach the peak!
Try not to harm them with your huge Dice!



If you are tired of being medieval architect, try yourself in fishing, or... i don't know, Mine Kart Racing League? Small minigames will let you take your mind off and earn some useful things for your village.
